QuestData.Title: Next Steps
QuestData.Description: You are positively on fire!$B$BWe have everything I need to create the scroll. Your arcane sanctum will be brimming with arcane energy in no time.$B$BI will teleport to Vol'jin's Pride to combine the reagents and marshal your forces. Meet me there when you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Magister Krelas at Vol'jin's Pride.
QuestData.RewardText: Your forces burn with passion for your cause.$B$BNot easy against such towering foes. Well done.
